definition: Copenhagen or København, capital of Denmark
root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc
abbr. for 哈薩克斯坦|哈萨克斯坦[Ha1 sa4 ke4 si1 tan3], Kazakhstan/abbr. for 哈爾濱|哈尔滨[Ha1 er3 bin1], Harbin
(interj.) ha!/(onom. for laughter)/(slang) to be infatuated with/to adore/abbr. for 哈士奇[ha1 shi4 qi2], husky (dog)
root/basis/classifier for long slender objects, e.g. cigarettes, guitar strings/CL:條|条[tiao2]/radical (chemistry)

sentences.english: But the mood in Copenhagen yesterday did not seem conducive to compromise.
sentences.chinese: 但昨日哥本哈根的气氛似乎不利于各方达成妥协。
波兹南，离哥本哈根还有多远？

sentences.english: The portents are bad for next month's climate change summit in Copenhagen.
sentences.chinese: 这对于下月在哥本哈根召开的气候变化峰会是种恶兆。

sentences.english: It is well-known that we are difficult to buy something cheap and good in Copenhagen.
sentences.chinese: 在哥本哈根想要买到便宜好货被公认是件难事。

sentences.english: This will make it difficult for America to claim the moral high ground at Copenhagen.
sentences.chinese: 这将使得美国很难要求在哥本哈根取得道德制高点。

sentences.english: Copenhagen will provide the green light for green growth.
sentences.chinese: 哥本哈根将为绿色增长大开绿灯。

sentences.english: He drives around Copenhagen, anxious to get to work and ready to adapt.
sentences.chinese: 他开着车在哥本哈根逛来逛去，急于着手开始工作。

sentences.english: close to Copenhagen in Denmark and there, around there.
sentences.chinese: 距离丹麦的哥本哈根比较近，在附近。

sentences.english: The Copenhagen conference side-stepped debate on the link between climate and development finance.
sentences.chinese: 哥本哈根会议绕开了气候与发展资金关系的争论。

sentences.english: A lot of design stuff and designers from Copenhagen.
sentences.chinese: 哥本哈根出了很多设计师和设计方面的东西。

sentences.english: Both Shanghai and Copenhagen are harbor cities.
sentences.chinese: 上海和哥本哈根都是海港城市。

sentences.english: In 2001 the Copenhagen Business School conferred on her the title Doctor Honoris Causa.
sentences.chinese: 2001年，被哥本哈根商学院授予荣誉博士学位。

sentences.english: That will severely limit Obama's room for manoeuvre at the Copenhagen talks.
sentences.chinese: 这将严重限制了奥巴马在哥本哈根谈判中的回旋余地。

sentences.english: Will a post-Copenhagen deal be struck in 2010?
sentences.chinese: 2010年，各国是否能够达成哥本哈根会后新协议？

sentences.english: Before the Copenhagen meeting Wulf Bernotat, the boss of E.
sentences.chinese: 在哥本哈根会议前德国能源巨头E。

definition: Rotterdam, port city in the Netherlands

pinyin: Bu4 la1 di2 si1 la1 fa1

definition: Bruges (Dutch Brugge), medieval town in Belgium
Zagreb, capital of Croatia 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4]
